Footnotes:

  1. The Parameter Number comes from the GRIB 2 Table 4.2 series
  2. The FNMOC Identifier is the same as the name
  3. The Status may be one of the following:
    4. valuedefinition
    availableEntry was used in the past, is not in production now, and could be used again.
    currentEntry is currently in production and available to customers.
    deprecatedEntry is no longer to be used. May or may not be in production.
    listedEntry is listed in WMO documentation. Not in production with no plans to be produced.
    obsoleteEntry is not to be used and is not in production, if it ever was.
    pendingEntry is being prepared for production.
    plannedEntry is being looked at for possible production.
  4. The WMO Status may be one of the following:
    5. valuedefinition
    deprecatedEntry is no longer used.
    experimentalEntry is not recommended for use outside of bi-lateral previously agreed tests.
    operationalEntry is available for use.
    validationEntry is in the approval process.
  5. The Joint METOC Brokerage Language (JMBL) identifier
  6. The Statistical number comes from the GRIB 2 Table 4.10
  7. The Unit of Time Range comes from the GRIB 2 Table 4.4
  8. The Length of Time is multiplied by the Unit of Time Range
